name: generate_thumbnail_prompt
description: Generate a cinematic AI image prompt for the YouTube thumbnail of a healing music video. Designed for tools like Dreamnima or CapCut AI.

scene.description: The core visual scene (e.g., girl by rainy window, night forest, lonely streetlamp).

palette.description: The color palette for the visual (e.g., midnight blue, deep purple, moonlight yellow).

style.description: The style of illustration (e.g., moody, dreamy, ultra-detailed, cinematic, paper cut-out).

aspect_ratio.description: The format of the image (e.g., 16:9, square).
